summary: WINDSHIELD WIPERS WILL STOP WORKING AT TIMES. YOU CAN TURN WIPER SWITCH OFF AND ON AND THEY MAY WORK AGAIN BUT WILL STOP AGAIN. SOMETIMES IT HARDER TO GET THEM WORKING AGAIN. I UNDERSTAND THERE HAS BEEN A RECALL ON SOME EARLY MODELS WITH THIS SAME PROBLEM. WHY NOT THE 1998 MODELS WITH SAME PROBLEM?  *JB
